My, that looks so good on you!
I have been working here for years,
but I have never gotten such a strange request for clothes.
Do not touch me in weird places!
Do not say it like that!
I want to go with you guys!
My daughter, who is Jotaro's mother...
Her life is in danger right now.
We are going on this journey to save my daughter's life.
Give up on running away and go back home.
I am sure your parents are worried.
I will make you look good this time, Grandpa.
Life is just a bunch of goodbyes!
But I did sort of want to see him again before I had to go.
You better save your mom, no matter what!
I will be cheering you on!
Pakistan is a young country, established in 1947
But when primitive peoples first began to live in Japan,
there was already civilization in Pakistan.
Here in Pakistan, the people carry on the five thousand year
But, Jotaro, I am surprised you were able to get someone to make you
a Japanese school uniform here in Pakistan.

Polnareff, is it safe to drive right now?
It appears the fog in this area is getting quite thick.
It might be a bit dangerous.
Since there is a sheer drop to one side, and no guard rail.
The fog gets thicker up ahead.
It is not even 3:00 yet, but I guess we have no choice.
Let us find a place to stay in that town for the night.
I wonder if there is a nice hotel.
One that has a decent toilet, of course!
I still cannot get used to the toilets in India and West Asia
where you wash yourself with your hands.
This is a nice little town.
I would say it has a population of a few thousand.
Let us ask about a hotel at that restaurant there.
But it sure is a weirdly quiet town...
Every other place has been super crowded and noisy.
It is probably because of the fog.
In Pakistan, and further west in the Islamic world,
this is how you greet people.
E-Er... You did not have to close up shop so suddenly...
We just wanted to ask a question.
What do you mean, you do not know?
I am sure he could not understand you because your pronunciation's so bad.
Let us ask the guy sitting there.
Sorry, but we are looking for a hotel.
Preferably a hotel with nice, clean toilets.
They died with that look of fear on their faces!
Why are they lying dead in the road?
What was the because of death?!
But it does not seem to be ordinary heart failure.
This guy is holding a gun...
There is smoke coming from it.
Maybe two to five minutes ago.
Either way, it was right before we got to this town.
There do not seem to be any wounds on the body,
and there is no blood anywhere.
Then how did this guy die?
His face is distorted like he was screaming in utter terror!
What did this man shoot with his gun?
What in the world is going on?
No one in the town noticed anything?
My acne seems to have festered.
By the way, did you need something?
I said I would like you to call the police.
There is a dead body over there!
Is there anything I can do?
I already asked you to call the police!
My acne has festered and it is so itchy.
What is with the people in this town?
Someone died and not a single person even cares to look,
let alone a whole curious crowd.
Did they not even hear the gunshot?
These people are even more indifferent
than people in large cities like New York or Tokyo.
It feels like the fog just keeps getting thicker.
The town seems to be engulfed by this fog.
Does not that part there look like a skull?
What do you want to do, old man?
You do not think it is the work of another Stand user, do you?
Would someone who is after us kill a man
who has nothing to do with us, before we even got here?
If they did, why did they kill him?
as much as we can without touching it, before the police come.
It appears he was traveling, too, just like us.
He has bus and train tickets.
And he appears to be Indian.
He is not from this town.
Right under his throat, there is a wound about the size of a 10 yen coin.
Is this the because of death?
But why is not there any blood coming from it?
With a hole this big, there should be
tons of blood gushing from it.
Looks like this is no ordinary murder.
There are holes all over it!
He looks like the cartoon cheese you would see in Tom Jerry!
And there is no blood coming from any of these holes.
How on earth was this man killed?
The odds that there is a new Stand user nearby just grew.
What the hell are you doing?
What do you mean, what am I doing?!
The car was right here a minute ago!
We just parked the car over there.
With this fog, it is dangerous to leave the town now.
There are many cliffs, you know.
I run a little bed and breakfast.
If you would like, why not stay there for the night?
We finally met a normal person!
There is a strong possibility that
a Stand user is hiding somewhere in this town.
This thick fog also gives them the upper hand.
We cannot let our guard down at all tonight.
But... even without anyone attacking us, this is a really creepy town.
This hotel is small... but about twenty years ago,
one of the 007 films was filmed here,
and John Lennon from the Beatles even stayed here once.
But it is still quite a nice hotel.
There are currently no other guests.
Would meat for dinner be all right?
You just said Joestar, did not you?
How did you know that name?
That person there just said Mr. Joestar a moment ago.
Well, I guess I might have.
When you have been in customer service for many years,
you learn to memorize people's names quickly.
So I am sure of it.
By the way, Madam, what happened to your left hand?
I just burned it a little...
It might because of my old age,
but I accidentally spilled boiling water on it.
You only look to be about forty.
Maybe I will ask you on a date.
Please do not tease me so, sir.
What the hell are you saying, you fool?!
I hate you most of all, Polnareff!
I will make sure you suffer a thousand times what my son did
when I cut your dick off and rip out your guts to kill you!
Oh, this does not look too bad.
My autograph's worth as much as Lennon's.
I am Paul nareff, after all!
Make sure you take care of it.
I will show you to your rooms.
All right, I am going to the bathroom.
Then I will not be able to use Hermit Purple to
Is there a bathroom in this room?
There does not seem to be one in mine.
Maybe the bathroom here is communal.
An unknown Stand user could attack at any moment...
So, the Joestar party is on the third floor?
I just now tracked them as far as this town.
I did not think you would come here yourself.
You just started crying out of nowhere.
Thank you for coming to see this lonely old woman!
I am very happy to see you!
Hol Horse, you were my son's friend, were you not?
Is that why you have come?
I am going to avenge my best friend!
That is why I am so happy!
How dare you abandon my son to save yourself, Hol Horse?
I was determined to kill you as soon as I saw you again.
You have got it all wrong!
When I got there, Centerfold was already dead!
You are as unforgivable as Polnareff!
I will have you die by the hands of my Stand, Justice!
I am sure you have heard of it, but have not seen it yet...
I shall show you now, Hol Horse!
Th-The blood from my arm where the scissors stabbed it...
It is going up into the fog...
My Stand, Justice, is a Stand made of fog.
Any wound touched by this fog becomes a fine hole like this.
The fog has entered the hole in your arm, like a string!
And now, you are my puppet!
Die by your own hand, Hol Horse!
That room at the back of the lobby is really loud...
I thought I heard a strange noise.
I am going to take a look downstairs.
I will be in the lobby, so call me if you need me.
The bathroom is just past that door.
I thought I just heard someone say toilet.
I always seem to get attacked in bathrooms...
